-- R0 -> 20
0000000000001000000001 00000000000000000000000000010100
0000000000000000000000
-- R1 -> 25
0000000000011000000001 00000000000000000000000000011001
0000000100000000000000
-- R2 -> 35
0000000000101000000001 00000000000000000000000000100011
0000001000000000000000
-- R3 -> 10
0000000000111000000001 00000000000000000000000000001010
0000001100000000000000
-- R4 -> 30
0000000001001000000001 00000000000000000000000000011110
0000010000000000000000
-- R2 -> NOT R2
0010000000101010110000
0000001000000000000000
-- R15 -> R4 + 2
0100000011111001010000
0000111100000000000000
-- R15 -> R15 - R4
1111010011111001000000
0000111100000000000000
-- R14 -> NOT R15
1111000011101010110000
0000111000000000000000
-- R13 -> R14 AND R15
1110111111011010000000
0000110100000000000000
-- R12 -> R14 XOR R15
1110111111001010100000
0000110000000000000000
-- R11 -> R14 OR R15
1110111110111010010000
0000101100000000000000
-- R10 -> SLL R15
0000111110101000000110
0000101000000000000000
-- R9 -> SRL R2
0000001010011000001010
0000100100000000000000
-- R8 -> R14 OR (NOT R0)
1110000010001011010000
0000100000000000000000
-- R7 -> R14 AND (NOT R0)
1110000001111011100000
0000011100000000000000
-- R6 -> R14 XOR (NOT R0)
1110000001101011110000
0000011000000000000000
-- R5 -> R0 + R1
0000000101011000100000
0000010100000000000000
-- R4 -> R3 - R4
0011010001001001000000
0000010000000000000000
-- R6 -> R4 XOR (NOT R0)
0100000001101011110000
0000011000000000000000
